Question.Subject: How do you use zazzle.com?
Question.Content: i just joined zazzle and i was wondering how do you put shirts up in the market place thing, i kno how to create the shirts but nothing else
Question.ChosenAnswer: You could try reading this ( http://www.zazzle.com/sell ). Or, if that is too complicated, you might consult the Zazzle new-user forum ( http://forum.zazzle.com/new ). Someone should be able to help you figure it out, there.

Answer.Content: You could try reading this ( http://www.zazzle.com/sell ). Or, if that is too complicated, you might consult the Zazzle new-user forum ( http://forum.zazzle.com/new ). Someone should be able to help you figure it out, there.
